Articles.Content:
I don't mean like Eve, where it slows you down a lot, I mean the colour is really thick. There is no gradient.

![qTTPSFV.png](http://i.imgur.com/qTTPSFV.png)

> 
> What planet is that?!?

Looks like a user made planet.

Are you asking how to make a gradient, or are you complaining that some planet pack has no gradient?

If it's the first, then share the planet config and maybe someone can help. If it's the second, you have to tell us the name of the mod, and a [few other things](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29)

> 
> Are you asking how to make a gradient, or are you complaining that some planet pack has no gradient?
> If it's the first, then share the planet config and maybe someone can help. If it's the second, you have to tell us the name of the mod, and a [few other things](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92229-How-To-Get-Support-%28READ-FIRST%29)

Sorry about that, it's my planet pack. ^^;
